text: John MacLaughlin (April 20, 1890 - March 18, 1961) was an American fencer. He competed in three events at the 1912 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1890 births Category:1961 deaths Category:American male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of the United States Category:Fencers at the 1912 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Rahway, New Jersey Category:American military personnel of World War I Category:American military personnel of World War II Category:Harvard Crimson fencers
title: John MacLaughlin
